product_description: The Akro-Mils 30235 AkroBins Plastic Stackable Storage Organizer Bin is a versatile solution for all your storage needs. Crafted from heavy-duty, one-piece industrial plastic, these bins are built to last, offering rust, water, and corrosion-proof durability. Perfect for classrooms, garages, and craft supplies, each bin can hold up to 50 pounds, making them ideal for organizing toys, or hardware. Designed with efficiency in mind, these stackable bins maximize your closet or workspace while keeping items neatly organized and easily accessible. The extra-wide stacking ledge provides stability, saves space and prevents spills, while the anti-slide stop prevents stacked bins from shifting forward. Reinforced side ribs add strength and prevent spreading when stacked. A curved-bottom hopper front makes it easy to retrieve small items. For a truly customized organization experience, consider optional dividers to create customizable compartment sizes and label holders (sold separately) to tailor each bin to your specific needs. The large front label area supports easy coding and scanning. Transform your space with the AkroBins—where durability meets versatility.

Made from industrial-grade polymers, these heavy-duty storage containers are a long-lasting alternative to weak cardboard options. Waterproof, easy-to-clean, and built to withstand indoor and outdoor use, they’re perfect for garages, kitchens, offices, closets, under sinks, or in cabinets. name: 40 Gallon Wheeled Industrial Tote, Dark Gray Rugged Plastic Bin with Latch Lid
short_description: Designed for storing larger, heavier items like camping equipment, sports gear, tools, and workshop supplies. Features robust non-slip grip latches and channeled walls that add strength, resisting crushing under heavy loads—ideal for active storage needs in garages, basements, or attics.

Equipped with an ergonomic handle that rotates up for comfortable pulling, plus large wheels paired with a metal axle. This design allows the tote to roll smoothly over rough surfaces (e.g., garage concrete, job site gravel), simplifying transportation of bulky or heavy stored items.

Boasts deep recessed lids that enable stable stacking of multiple totes. This feature helps make efficient use of vertical storage space, whether in warehouses, closets, or garage shelves, without compromising the stability of the stack.

The tight-fit lid with drip-resistant design provides maximum protection against moisture, keeping stored items dry. It also keeps contents securely contained, preventing dust, debris, or small pests from entering—suitable for long-term storage in damp areas like basements.

Exterior dimensions: 36 3/4" L x 21 3/8" W x 18" H; interior bottom dimensions: 30 1/2" L x 16" W x 17 1/8". These detailed measurements help you confirm if the tote fits your intended space (e.g., truck beds, warehouse corners) or accommodates specific large items before purchase.
product_description: Bring order to garages, basements, and attics with the heavy-duty design and unique features of Industrial Tote line. Be confident that stored items will stay protected in the durable 40 Gallon Wheeled Industrial Tote, the ideal portable solution for storing larger and heavier supplies. The grooved lid design and keyholes provide options for tie-downs to simplify transportation, and keep totes in place in the back of a pick-up truck. The ergonomic handle rotates up for easy pulling while the large wheels and metal axle allow for rolling over rough surfaces. The innovative drip-resistant lid provides maximum protection against items getting wet, while the tight-fit lid keeps items contained. The robust latches offer extra security that the lid will stay attached to the base, and the textured surface makes for a sure grip when carrying. The deep recessed lids provide stability when stacking for efficient use of storage space. Channeled walls provide added strength and help to resist crushing under heavier loads. The 40 Gallon Wheeled Industrial Tote is ideal for more active storage needs, store camping equipment, sports gear, tools and workshop supplies, and other bulky items. The overall assembled dimensions of this item are 36 3/4" L x 21 3/8" W x 18" H.
